Package hr.pmf.nbp.projekt

Class FastestPath

java.lang.Object
hr.pmf.nbp.projekt.FastestPath
public class FastestPath
extends java.lang.Object
A class offers method that finds the fastest path, that is - the shortest path in the meaning of time needed to get from starting point to destination point. The implemented algorithm is a simple version of Dijkstra's shortest path algorithm. It returns result tuples (cityName, timeToGetToTheCity) of each node in the path.
Author:
Margarita Tolja

  • Method Details

    • fastestPath

      public java.util.stream.Stream<FastestPath.Checkpoint> fastestPath​(java.lang.String startCity, java.lang.String endCity, java.lang.Boolean panorama)
      Finds the fastest path from one city to another, and returns the checkpoints along the way. If the panorama flag is set to true, the path is understood to go through all cities along the way. Otherwise, the cities on a highway are 'skipped'. The node representing cities has following properties: 'name' and 'duration'(time needed to get across it). The connection between cities has following properties: 'duration' and 'roadType'.
      Parameters:
      startCity - The name of the starting city.
      endCity - The name of the target city.
      panorama - A flag showing if all cities on the path are visited directly.
      Returns:
      Tuples of (cityName, timeToGetToTheCity) of each city in the path.

    • initialise

      private void initialise()
      Utility method. Initialises the containers to appropriate values according to Dijkstra's algorithm.

    • findClosestInQ

      private org.neo4j.graphdb.Node findClosestInQ()
      Utility method. Finds the city that takes the least time to reach at current point in the algorithm and is yet unchecked.
      Returns:
      The node most easily reached from the starting point.

    • getNeighbours

      private java.util.Map<org.neo4j.graphdb.Node,​org.neo4j.graphdb.Relationship> getNeighbours​(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node node)
      Utility method. Gets the nodes directly connected to the node passed as argument.
      Parameters:
      node - Node of interest.
      Returns:
      Map of tuples (node, relationshipThatConnectsThem).

    • getRelationship

      private org.neo4j.graphdb.Relationship getRelationship​(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node first, org.neo4j.graphdb.Node second)
      Utility method. Gets the relationship between the passed nodes.
      Parameters:
      first - Start node.
      second - End node.
      Returns:
      Relationship between the nodes, or null if there is none.

    • findNodeByName

      private org.neo4j.graphdb.Node findNodeByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Utility method. Finds node by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the city.
      Returns:
      The node with the name property as passed in argument.
